name.description: The name of the API (required). Used to generate class names and file paths.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like your API to have? i.e: MyApi

computeType.description: The type of compute to use to deploy this API. Choose between ServerlessApiGatewayRestApi (default) or ServerlessApiGatewayHttpApi.
computeType.x-prompt: What compute type would you like to deploy your API with?

integrationStyle.description: How Lambda handlers are generated for the API. Choose between Individual Functions (default) and Router.

x-prompt.message: How would you like to map Lambda handlers to your tRPC procedures?

auth.description: The method used to authenticate with your API. Choose between IAM (default), Cognito or None.
auth.x-prompt: How would you like users to authenticate with your API?

directory.description: The directory to store the application in.
directory.x-prompt: What directory would you like to store your application in?

iacProvider.description: The preferred IaC provider. By default this is inherited from your initial selection.
iacProvider.x-prompt: Which provider would you like to manage your infrastructure? (default: Inherit)
